title: Is Vitamin D a Life Changer?
description:
Once we identify our biases, how do we find the courage to talk about them? And, what exactly is vitamin D and is there a link between D deficiency and Covid severity? Plus, Jillian answers email questions about metabolism, bone density, and exercises to strengthen your lower back.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
